Description: Highly Available and Fault-Tolerant Web Application Infrastructure

ProjectName.Description: Project name for resource naming and tagging

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, test, prod)

TrustedIPRange.Description: Trusted IP range for HTTP/HTTPS access (e.g., office IP)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

DomainName.Description: Domain name for Route 53 (e.g., myapp.com). Use .local for testing or provide your actual domain.

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2023 AMI ID from SSM Parameter Store (works in all regions)

Statement.Sid: Allow services to use the key

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when ALB has unhealthy targets
Alert when CPU utilization is high
Alert when database CPU utilization is high
Alert when database storage space is low

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the load balancer

StaticContentBucketName.Description: Name of the static content S3 bucket

LogsBucketName.Description: Name of the logs S3 bucket

WebServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security group ID for web servers
